entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
